content:
Dear Professor,

I am writing to ask if I may be granted a few hours of extension for a checkoff for PSet 3, since I was unable to join the help queue tonight on time.

I understand that my request is unexcused as per the course's info, however I am hoping that an unforeseen personal update that I had last night and kept me away from campus until 11 pm tonight would be kindly considered as you examine my request.

In addition, I would be willing to give away my remaining 1 late day in exchange for that extension in order to show goodwill and my commitment to abide by the class' deadlines and policies.

Best,

Magdy
subject: Checkoff Queue
